Package eu.datacrop.maize.model_repository.persistence.daos

Interface VendorPersistenceLayerDaos

All Known Implementing Classes:
VendorMongoDaos
public interface VendorPersistenceLayerDaos
This interface defines the services offered by the persistence layer pertaining to Vendors.
Since:
version 0.4.0
Author:
Angela-Maria Despotopoulou [Athens, Greece]

  • Method Details

    • retrieveVendorByDatabaseID

      VendorResponseWrapper retrieveVendorByDatabaseID(String databaseID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Method to retrieve an existing Vendor using its databaseID as unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      databaseID - A UUID that uniquely identifies an existing Vendor in the database, not null.
      Returns:
      A wrapped data transfer object with either information on the retrieved Vendor or failure messages.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - if requestDto is null.

    • retrieveVendorByName

      VendorResponseWrapper retrieveVendorByName(String name) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Method to retrieve an existing Vendor using its name as unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      name - A string that uniquely identifies an existing Vendor in the database, not null.
      Returns:
      A wrapped data transfer object with either information on the retrieved Vendor or failure messages.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - if name is null.

    • retrieveAllVendors

      VendorResponsesWrapper retrieveAllVendors(int page, int size)
      Method to retrieve all Vendors paginated.
      Parameters:
      page - The page to retrieve.
      size - The intended size of pages.
      Returns:
      A wrapped data transfer object with either information on the retrieved Vendors or failure messages.

    • createVendor

      VendorResponseWrapper createVendor(VendorRequestDto requestDto) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Method to persist a new Vendor.
      Parameters:
      requestDto - A data transfer object with values for the attributes of the Vendor, not null.
      Returns:
      A wrapped data transfer object with either information on the created Vendor or failure messages.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - if requestDto is null.

    • updateVendor

      VendorResponseWrapper updateVendor(VendorRequestDto requestDto, String databaseID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Method to update an existing Vendor using its databaseID as unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      requestDto - A data transfer object with values for the attributes of the Vendor, not null.
      databaseID - A UUID that uniquely identifies an existing Vendor in the database, not null.
      Returns:
      A wrapped data transfer object with either information on the updated Vendor or failure messages.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - if requestDto is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - - if databaseID is null or empty string.

    • deleteVendor

      VendorResponseWrapper deleteVendor(String databaseID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Method to delete an existing Vendor using its databaseID as unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      databaseID - A UUID that uniquely identifies an existing Vendor in the database, not null.
      Returns:
      A wrapped data transfer object with either information on the deleted Vendor or failure messages.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - - if databaseID is null or empty string.

    • deleteAllVendors

      VendorResponseWrapper deleteAllVendors()
      Method to delete all existing Vendors.
      Returns:
      A wrapped data transfer object with either a success message or failure messages.
